inapplicable.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
inapplicable.help: accesskey attribute value should be unique

inapplicable.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
inapplicable.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

inapplicable.description: Ensures an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
inapplicable.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

inapplicable.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
inapplicable.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

inapplicable.description: Ensure aria-braillelabel and aria-brailleroledescription have a non-braille equivalent
inapplicable.help: aria-braille attributes must have a non-braille equivalent

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements do not use deprecated roles
inapplicable.help: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
inapplicable.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
inapplicable.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
inapplicable.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

inapplicable.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
inapplicable.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

inapplicable.description: Ensures role="text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants
inapplicable.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

inapplicable.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

inapplicable.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
inapplicable.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensures <blink> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly
inapplicable.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
inapplicable.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

inapplicable.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
inapplicable.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

inapplicable.description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Table header text should not be empty

inapplicable.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
inapplicable.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
inapplicable.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

inapplicable.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
inapplicable.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
inapplicable.help: Frames must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
inapplicable.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

inapplicable.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

inapplicable.description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
inapplicable.help: Form elements should have a visible label

inapplicable.description: Ensures every form element has a label
inapplicable.help: Form elements must have labels

inapplicable.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
inapplicable.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
inapplicable.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
inapplicable.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
inapplicable.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
inapplicable.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
inapplicable.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
inapplicable.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

inapplicable.description: Ensures <marquee> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used for delayed refresh
inapplicable.help: Delayed refresh under 20 hours must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures <object> elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

inapplicable.description: Elements marked as presentational should not have global ARIA or tabindex to ensure all screen readers ignore them
inapplicable.help: Ensure elements marked as presentational are consistently ignored

inapplicable.description: Ensures [role="img"] elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: [role="img"] elements must have an alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
inapplicable.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
inapplicable.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

inapplicable.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: Select element must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
inapplicable.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
inapplicable.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

inapplicable.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
inapplicable.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
inapplicable.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

inapplicable.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
inapplicable.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

inapplicable.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
inapplicable.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

inapplicable.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
inapplicable.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

inapplicable.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
inapplicable.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

inapplicable.description: Ensures <video> elements have captions
inapplicable.help: <video> elements must have captions

inapplicable.description: Ensures <video> or <audio> elements do not autoplay audio for more than 3 seconds without a control mechanism to stop or mute the audio
inapplicable.help: <video> or <audio> elements must not play automatically
